column5: If you had the opportunity to fish Lake Of The Woods the first week in June or the last week in June, which would you choose?
I'd be aiming for the first week. Fish are still in there spring patterns and easier to find. Mike

2006 will only be our 3rd trip to LOTW and the last 2 yrs we went the 3rd(19-26)week of June & we are changing this year to June 3-10 as our resort owner said year in/out fishing is typically better earlier. We are basically smb fishermen. It always hinges on mother nature. good luck.
